attributes.action: Hold a vote of no confidence in the government
attributes.additional_details: The election of a new PM at this time has shown the lack of faith of the British public in both possible candidates, the house should have their opportunity to extend the new PM a mandate to form a government
attributes.background: Parliament should have the possibility to express their confidence or no confidence in the new PM to form an effective government by holding a vote of no confidence

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for MPs or Ministers to be sacked or for them to resign. 

You could sign a petition calling for a General Election

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619781
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/621931
